body_html: Why would we want this added to python_function.cpp? It's already a very complicated code path, and it doesn't seem worth it to me. The only function that currently uses this is CudnnRNN which, as I understand, is going to be moved to C++ soon, so it won't be even used.
body_text: Why would we want this added to python_function.cpp? It's already a very complicated code path, and it doesn't seem worth it to me. The only function that currently uses this is CudnnRNN which, as I understand, is going to be moved to C++ soon, so it won't be even used.
body: Why would we want this added to `python_function.cpp`? It's already a very complicated code path, and it doesn't seem worth it to me. The only function that currently uses this is CudnnRNN which, as I understand, is going to be moved to C++ soon, so it won't be even used.
